name: Survivors Advocating for Freedom Today (SAF-T)
description: CUAV's membership program fosters a membership base in order to develop the leadership and capacity of LGBTQI2S survivors of violence to break isolation, increase community connections and create systemic change toward the larger goals of decreasing deportation, homelessness and incarceration rates. The SAF-T Program focuses on building solidarity through organizing and discussing safety and liberation for our communities. This program is led by Black and Brown Queer and Trans folks and meets ev

howToGetIt: Visit https://www.cuav.org/saf-t and click on the "Sign-Up" button to have the program staff reach out to you directly.
address: 427 South Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94103
